name: generator-ng-fullstack
description: Client, server or fullstack - it's up to you. ng-fullstack gives you the best of the latest: Node, Go, HTTP/2, Angular 1, Angular 2, Vue, Aurelia, Express, Koa, Echo, Gin, MongoDB, Gulp, Babel, Typescript and much more.

scripts.test: npm run lint && mocha test/ --recursive -R dot --check-leaks --require babel-core/register
scripts.test-ci: npm run lint && babel-node ./node_modules/istanbul/lib/cli cover ./node_modules/.bin/_mocha test/  --report lcovonly -- --recursive -R min --check-leaks --require babel-core/register && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage
